Class OptimizingButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • unit.customizeScreen.OptimizingButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class OptimizingButton
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    OptimizingButton is a class containing a button and a listener ( PlayerG) that gets alerted whenever a button the button is pressed

    Peter
